ygData.subject: Re: Paladins
ygData.msgSnippet: At level 39 here is my top 5 list for creating aggro upon myself. By keeping the mob taunted upon myself, I allow the tanks to backstab/attack from the back
ygData.messageBody:
At level 39 here is my top 5 list for creating
aggro upon myself. By keeping the mob taunted upon
myself, I allow the tanks to backstab/attack from the
back while I jog around in a circle and the nukers can
nuke from afar in peace.<br><br>5. Damage shield (of
Spikes) - but not needed with this tactic<br>4. Snare (as
you said easily taunted off by tanks)<br>3. Immolate
(mobs don't like fire, especially that clinging
type)<br>2. Firestrike (again, mobs and fire don't mix)<br>1.
Fury of Air (Nuke him and he'll run at you, no matter
what else is going on.)<br><br>This allows for a
carrot-on-a-stick sort of group attacking... only costs me a snare,
immolate, and one fury and the tanks/other nukers can have
a hey-day with the mob as I run around waving my
wolfformed tail at him in relative safety.<br><br>Nukai
Oakenwulf
